name: The Secret Room
description:
You're trapped in the home with no way out. The only hint you have at a possible escape is a hastily painted door on the wall. Unlock the secrets within before it's too late! 

4 endings to find! Best played with headphones.

Developed in 1 month as part of OpenGameArt's Fall Game Jam 2022. The optional theme was "Gourd(s)", but this game is sadly gourd-less.

Let me know what you think in the comments! Love honest feedback, good or bad. :)

(The menu options -- including the Credits menu option -- become available once you advance in the first scene.)
